Name: HP +3
Description: Grants +3 to max HP.

Name: HP +4
Description: Grants +4 to max HP.

Name: HP +5
Description: Grants +5 to max HP.

Name: Attack +1
Description: Grants Atk +1.

Name: Attack +2
Description: Grants Atk +2.

Name: Attack +3
Description: Grants Atk +3.

Name: Speed +1
Description: Grants Spd +1.

Name: Speed +2
Description: Grants Spd +2.

Name: Speed +3
Description: Grants Spd +3.

Name: Defense +1
Description: Grants Def + 1.

Name: Defense +2
Description: Grants Def + 2.

Name: Defense +3
Description: Grants Def + 3.

Name: Resistance +1
Description: Grants Res +1.

Name: Resistance +2
Description: Grants Res +2.

Name: Resistance +3
Description: Grants Res +3.

Name: Fury 1
Description: Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+1. After combat, deals 2 damage to unit.

Name: Fury 2
Description: Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+2. After combat, deals 4 damage to unit.

Name: Fury 3
Description: Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3. After combat, deals 6 damage to unit.

Name: Life and Death 1
Description: Grants Atk/Spd+3. Inflicts Def/Res-3.

Name: Life and Death 2
Description: Grants Atk/Spd+4. Inflicts Def/Res-4.

Name: Life and Death 3
Description: Grants Atk/Spd+5. Inflicts Def/Res-5.

Name: Death Blow 1
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+2 during combat.

Name: Death Blow 2
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+4 during combat.

Name: Death Blow 3
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+6 during combat.

Name: Darting Blow 1
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd+2 during combat.

Name: Darting Blow 2
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd+4 during combat.

Name: Darting Blow 3
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd+6 during combat.

Name: Armored Blow 1
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Def+2 during combat.

Name: Armored Blow 2
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Def+4 during combat.

Name: Armored Blow 3
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Def+6 during combat.

Name: Warding Blow 1
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Res+2 during combat.

Name: Warding Blow 2
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Res+4 during combat.

Name: Warding Blow 3
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants Res+6 during combat.

Name: Defiant Atk 1
Description: Grants Atk+3 at start of turn if unit’s HP ≤ 50%

Name: Defiant Atk 2
Description: Grants Atk+5 at start of turn if unit’s HP ≤ 50%

Name: Defiant Atk 3
Description: Grants Atk+7 at start of turn if unit’s HP ≤ 50%

Name: Defiant Spd 1
Description: Grants Spd+3 at start of turn if unit’s HP ≤ 50%

Name: Defiant Spd 2
Description: Grants Spd+5 at start of turn if unit’s HP ≤ 50%

Name: Defiant Spd 3
Description: Grants Spd+7 at start of turn if unit’s HP ≤ 50%

Name: Defiant Def 1
Description: Grants Def+3 at start of turn if unit’s HP ≤ 50%

Name: Defiant Def 2
Description: Grants Def+5 at start of turn if unit’s HP ≤ 50%

Name: Defiant Def 3
Description: Grants Def+7 at start of turn if unit’s HP ≤ 50%

Name: Defiant Res 1
Description: Grants Res+3 at start of turn if unit’s HP ≤ 50%

Name: Defiant Res 2
Description: Grants Res+5 at start of turn if unit’s HP ≤ 50%

Name: Defiant Res 3
Description: Grants Res+7 at start of turn if unit’s HP ≤ 50%

Name: Svalinn Shield
Description: Neutralizes "effective against armored" bonuses.

Name: Grani's Shield
Description: Neutralizes "effective against cavalry" bonuses.

Name: Iote's Shield
Description: Neutralizes "effective against fliers" bonuses.

Name: Triangle Adept 1
Description: If unit has weapon-triangle advantage, boosts Atk by 10%. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage, reduces Atk by 10%.

Name: Triangle Adept 2
Description: If unit has weapon-triangle advantage, boosts Atk by 15%. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage, reduces Atk by 15%.

Name: Triangle Adept 3
Description: If unit has weapon-triangle advantage, boosts Atk by 20%. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage, reduces Atk by 20%.

Name: Close Counter
Description: Enables unit to counterattack regardless of distance to attacker.

Name: Distant Counter
Description: Enables unit to counterattack regardless of distance to attacker.

Name: Seal Atk 1
Description: Inflicts Atk-3 on foe through its next action after combat.

Name: Seal Atk 2
Description: Inflicts Atk-5 on foe through its next action after combat.

Name: Seal Atk 3
Description: Inflicts Atk-7 on foe through its next action after combat.

Name: G Tomebreaker 1
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a green tome foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

Name: G Tomebreaker 2
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 80% in combat against a green tome foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

Name: G Tomebreaker 3
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a green tome foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

Name: Lunge
Description: If unit initiates combat, unit and target foe swap spaces after combat.

Name: Knock Back
Description: If unit initiates combat, target foe moves 1 space away after combat.

Name: Drag Back
Description: If unit initiates combat, unit moves 1 space away after combat. Target foe moves to unit's previous space.

Name: Hit and Run
Description: If unit initiates combat, unit moves 1 space away after combat.

Name: Renewal 1
Description: At the start of every fourth turn, restores 10 HP.

Name: Renewal 2
Description: At the start of every third turn, restores 10 HP.

Name: Renewal 3
Description: At start of odd-numbered turns, restores 10 HP.
